AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia traveller
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoys traveling around, and the exploration experience [PAWN_pronoun] gained makes [PAWN_pronoun] more skilled in pioneering and exploring the wilderness than most Celestia natives, even though [PAWN_pronoun] still struggles to fully handle Rimworld's complex ecosystems.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia outpost bartender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a bartender and part-time brewer in a frontier outpost bar. Many of [PAWN_possessive] skills became useless under Rimworld's harsh conditions. The good news is, people here still seek bartenders to chat with, even if all [PAWN_pronoun] can offer is a cup of plain water.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia liaison officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] operated radio equipment at Celestia's relay communication station, maintaining contact between outposts. The terrible electromagnetic environment and makeshift cobbled-together equipment made [PAWN_pronoun] deeply envy seniors working in the home star system: they reportedly only needed automated DustMech to maintain the equipment while enjoying salted potato chips in comfortable rooms!

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia outpost guard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] received basic training to perform auxiliary security duties at Celestia outposts. Putting out fires, maintaining order, clearing insect infestations. Though not a professional, [PAWN_pronoun] was more than capable of handling minor disturbances in the Rimworld.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia lucky hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] hunted wild animals for the outpost, relying almost entirely on luck with only a 50% chance of bringing back prey.\n\nBut one time, [PAWN_pronoun] miraculously encountered a bleeding thrumbo. When [PAWN_pronoun] dragged the beast back to the outpost, everyone gazed at [PAWN_objective] with mixed envy and disbelief.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia reclusive hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew weary of social life and eventually chose seclusion, hunting for food while occasionally visiting settlements for supplies.\n\nOne day, after ambushing a thrumbo into critical condition, the beast suddenly rallied and escaped [PAWN_possessive] sight. [PAWN_nameDef] abruptly realized cooperative hunting might be better.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia relic farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for food supply at a Celestia outpost, not through labor but knowledge. The outpost possessed automated agricultural equipment dismantled from The Navigator Programme, making [PAWN_pronoun] more of an engineer than a farmer. By maintaining the self-powered automated farm at minimal operation, [PAWN_pronoun] could supply food for multiple surrounding colonies, with surplus energy even sustaining the entire outpost's power grid.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: The exaggerated creature sizes in Rimworld made [PAWN_possessive] farming efforts unexpectedly difficult. Just subduing giant rodents took considerable effort, not to mention dealing with enraged wildlife and raiders destroying crops. [PAWN_pronoun] often had to roll up [PAWN_possessive] sleeves to drive these bastards back home.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia senior architect
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the senior architect of the outpost. Not only did [PAWN_pronoun] study construction blueprints from The Navigator Programme, but also designed new Rimworld-adapted structures. [PAWN_pronoun] personally participated in all colonial construction projects, ultimately building a new home with companions.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia mineral prospector
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] scouted mineral deposits for Celestia pioneers, sometimes joining merchant caravans, sometimes venturing alone into unexplored regions. While some believed in Celestia's survival, [PAWN_pronoun] was convinced they would build another glitter world here. Rediscovering the planet's hidden resources was the first step toward that future.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia alien-creature cooking master
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Thanks to an anonymous predecessor's alien cooking guide in The Navigator Programme database, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to safely process Rimworld's bizarre creatures and make them palatable. As [PAWN_pronoun] put it, combining these monstrosities with unadapted microbes made food poisoning prevention the real challenge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia navigator-tech archaeologist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Celestia colonists arriving via The Navigator Programme faced technological discontinuity. Though the "Self-explanatory Tech Core" could holographically display their tech, practical implementation remained challenging. These technologies became known as Navigator Tech.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef], a specialist in recreating Navigator Tech, possessed eccentric thinking and social awkwardness that ironically granted [PAWN_objective] exceptional aptitude. Combined with manual skills, [PAWN_pronoun] brought forgotten technologies back to light.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia old-school artist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always believed [PAWN_pronoun] had artistic talent, yet nobody appreciated [PAWN_possessive] masterpieces. A chance discovery of classical art forms from The Navigator Programme database made [PAWN_pronoun] question whether [PAWN_pronoun] was born in the wrong era or if modern Celestia's aesthetics had regressed.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia outpost doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a clinic at a Celestia outpost, treating pioneers and caravan members for fees. Claiming [PAWN_possessive] skills came from family "tricks", though none could verify if this mentor truly existed.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia outpost leader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Initially offering suggestions to stop inefficiency, [PAWN_nameDef] soon realized communication failures caused disputes. By understanding needs and proposing collaborative solutions, [PAWN_pronoun] gradually became the de facto leader when the outpost adopted [PAWN_possessive] effective guidance.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] initially joined Celestia's army only to take revenge, hostile forces destroyed [PAWN_possessive] homeland in a surprise attack without a second thought, so [PAWN_pronoun] enlisted in the army hoping to take revenge on those bandits as well in anger. There were also many who discouraged [PAWN_nameDef], but until [PAWN_pronoun] actually calmed down, these words did nothing to quench [PAWN_possessive] anger.
